summary:
After red mountan erupted , seed from Vvardenfell fell from the skies.
from said seeds emperor parasols were found in the ashes of the volcanic tundra
descriptionHtml:
After red mountan erupted , seed from Vvardenfell fell from the skies.
from said seeds emperor parasols were found in the ashes of the volcanic tundra.

This mod ads Emperor parasols (Giant mushrooms) from the dragonborn DLC into the volcanic tundra , it ads much needed life to the area.

For the time being there is no lod , but there will be in the near future.
author: C0331 AKA privata
